plot: Two teams of celebrities compete in a number of challenges and games, including one on a huge set that tilts at 22-1/2 degrees and others that take place in complete darkness.
plot_en: Two teams of celebrities compete in a number of challenges and games, including one on a huge set that tilts at 22-1/2 degrees and others that take place in complete darkness.

title: Riot
